```{r}
fin_seg %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = population, y = totaltractsf)) +
  geom_point()

fin_seg %>%
  filter(totaltractsf > 600)

fin_seg %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = logpop)) +
  geom_histogram()

fin_seg %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = population, y = H_citytract_NHW_i)) +
  geom_point() + 
  geom_smooth(se = FALSE, method = "lm")

fin_seg %>%
  filter(totaltractsf < 100) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = totaltractsf, y = H_citytract_NHW_i)) +
  geom_point() + 
  geom_smooth(se = FALSE, method = "lm")

fin_seg %>%
  filter(totaltractsf < 10) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = totaltractsf, y = H_citytract_NHW_i)) +
  geom_point() + 
  geom_smooth(se = FALSE, method = "lm")

fin_seg %>%
  filter(population < 25000)

fin_seg %>%
  filter(population > 25000)

fin_imp %>%
```
